<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/derivedarglist">DerivedArgList</a> - An ordered collection of driver arguments, whose storage may be in another argument list. <a href="#details">More...</a>
